RT0162-d-10-07-01-RT.Accident Cause: Shoving movement, absence of man on or at leading end of movement
RT0162-d-10-07-01-RT.Narrative: THE BRIDGE OPERATOR WAS UNABLE TO LINE THE ELECTRIC INTERLOCK SWITCH FOR THE 229 CREW TO TRAVEL UP TRAACK 100 FROM 560.  CREW 229 WAS INSTRUCTED TO SHOVE OUT 560 TO TRACK 700 SO THEY WOULD BE ABLE TOGO TO THE BOF FROM 700 THROUGH THE 0 TRACK. AS THE CREW SHOVED THE 7 LOADED IRON LADLES SOUTH FROM 560 TO 700, THE CONDUCTOR THAT WAS ALLEGEDLY RIDING THE LEAD END INDICATED THAT THE 169700 TRACKS SWITCH (SPRING SWITCH) WAS "OK", LINED FOR 700.  WHEN THE LOCOMOTIVE CLEARED THE HIGH BLOCK, THEY CEASED MOVEMENT.  WHEN THEY RECEIVED THE YELLOW SIGMAL TO MOVE 700 TO THE 0 TRACK, THE CREW BEGAN PULLINGTHE LADLES NORTH.  AFTER APPROXIMATELY FOUR CAR LENGTHS, THE MOVEMENT WENT INTO EMERGENCY BRAKES APPLICATION.  THE 169 SPRING SWITCH WAS LINED FOR 169, NOT TRACK 700 AS THE CONDUCTOR THOUGHT.  THREEAND ON-HALF OF THE LADLES HAD BEEN SHOVED SOUTH THOUGH THE SWITCH, AND AS THEY PULLED NORTH, THE NORTH TRACKS OF THE FOURTH LADLE FROM THE LOCOMOTIVE TRAVELLED DOWN 700 AND THE SOUTH TRACKS ALONG WITHOTHER THREE LADLES TRAVELLED DOWN 169, CAUSING THE DERAILMENT OF THE THREE LADLES (THIRD,FOURTH, FIFTH FROM LOCOMTIVES).NoneNoneNone

1-d-10-11-01-EDW.Narrative: AS THE TRAIN EXITED THE SWITCH ACCESSING THE MAINLINE, A RAIL BROKE UNDER LPG CAR GAPX 10016.  AS THIS CAR DERAILED THE RAIL OPPOSITE THE BRAKE WAS LAID OVER BY LATERAL FORCES AND CREATED A FLANGE WAYTHAT TRACKED THE DERAILED CAR TO A SOFT SHOULDER TO THE INSIDE OF THE CURVE.  THIS RAIL THEN FRACTURED AND SENT THE DERAILED TRUCK OFF THE ROAD BED WHERE IT INSTANTLY SANK AND BEGAN TO ROLL OVER.  THE LAST TWO RAIL CARS PROVIDED ENOUGH RESISTANCE TO REMAIN UPRIGHT.  HOWEVER, THE COUPLER WAS RIPPEDFROM THE GAPX 10016 AND IT CONTINUED TO ROLL AND TAKE WITH IT THE REMAINING CONSIST.  THE RESULT WASTWO SULFIDE CARS GATX 13624/ GATX 91741 AND GAPX 10016 WOUND UP INVERTED IN AND ACROSS LOUTRE CREEKAND DISPLACED SOME 30' FROM THE MAINLINE AND AT VARYING ELEVATIONS FROM 5' TO 15' BELOW THE TRACK SURFACE.  THE REMAINING CARS LAY ON THEIR SIDES WITH THE EXCEPTION OF GATX 12878 WHICH REMAINED UPRIGHT BUT LEANING AT ABOUT 30 DEGREES.  THE INCIDENT INITIATED AT A MOVING SPEED OF LESS THAN 5 MPH.NoneNoneNoneNoneNone
